TenderNotice.title: Notice Inviting e-Tender

tenderDetails.nameOfWork: Replacing of water supply pipeline for KV building at NIT Agartala

TenderNotice.invitedFrom: Central & State Government Sector Undertakings/Enterprises and eligible Contractors/Firms/Agencies of appropriate class registered with State PWDs/CPWD/MES/Railway/P&T or other registered firms.

biddingProcess.instructions: Bidding is online only. Bidders can bid 24x7 until the closing time. Re-submission is allowed, with the latest bid being considered. Physical submission of bids is not permitted.

bidOpening.process: Bids will be opened online and will be accessible to bidders through https://eprocure.gov.in. Bidders may be present at the bid opening.

additionalInfo.corrigendumNote: Any subsequent corrigendum will be available on the website only.
